house_listing.house_description: Awesome 3 story luxury living home, great community & schools! Shows like a model! 9 ft ceilings, fireplace, jacuzzi tub! New carpet and appliances! Great price and great location.
house_listing.firm_name: William E. Wood At The Mall
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Club House, Fenced, Wet Bar
